mapper.insert: INSERT INTO baking.content(title, img_url, video_url, content, type, view_count, comment_count, brief, category_id, user_id, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{imgUrl}, #{videoUrl}, #{content}, #{type}, 0, 0, #{brief}, #{categoryId}, #{userId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, title, brief, c.type, cat.name categoryName, view_count, comment_count, create_time FROM baking.content c JOIN baking.category cat on cat.id = c.category_id WHERE c.type = #{type} AND c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.img_url, u.img_url userImgUrl, u.nickname, cat.name categoryName FROM baking.content c JOIN baking.user u on u.id = c.user_id JOIN baking.category cat on cat.id = c.category_id WHERE c.type = #{type} AND c.category_id = #{categoryId} LIMIT 0,4

SELECT c.id, c.title, c.brief, c.content, u.nickname, u.img_url userImgUrl, c.create_time, c.view_count, u.id userId, c.type, c.video_url FROM baking.content c JOIN baking.category cat on cat.id = c.category_id JOIN baking.user u on u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.id = #{id}
